meaning: You're already operating at a high level. Your edge now is strategy, org influence, and building systems (design system, UX ops, research ops).
dayToDayReality: Sets product and design strategy for major initiatives or entire product areas.
Builds and maintains design systems, research ops, or UX processes.
Influences product roadmap and business decisions through design leadership.
Mentors multiple designers and helps shape team culture.
Represents design in executive discussions and cross-org initiatives.
commonMistakes: Getting too far from hands-on design work and losing touch with craft.
Not investing in systems that scale design quality across the org.
Focusing only on individual impact instead of team and org outcomes.
Not staying current with industry trends and best practices.
nextGrowthFocus: Build scalable design systems and processes that improve quality org-wide.
Develop research ops or design ops capabilities.
Take on org-level initiatives: hiring, culture, or cross-team alignment.
Share knowledge externally through writing, speaking, or teaching.
